title: JST, Exodus 33
content: Thou canst not see my face
at this time, lest mine anger be kindled against thee also, and I destroy thee, and thy people;
for they are exceeding sinful. And no sinful man hath at any time, neither shall there be any sinful man at any time, that shall see my face and live.
And I will take away mine hand, and thou shalt see my back parts, but my face shall not be seen,
as at other times; for I am angry with my people Israel
